EXTRACTED VALUE: Forza 2 is a great game for novices and gearheads alike. Play it simple or fiddle with every last thing you can – the game works both ways.
It's so pretty that it’s fun to just simply watch it rather than play it.
The graphics are sharp, the sound is superb, the campaign is engaging and the online play is great and has lasting appeal.
Rock Band is certainly the most ambitious music game yet and largely succeeds.
